title: No time to spare
brief_description: Gives a detailed demonstration of the Holger-Nielsen method of applying artificial respiration. Shows the technique applied to an adult and a child, pointing out the operator’s position, placement of hands, action and timing.
description: Gives a detailed demonstration of the Holger-Nielsen method of applying artificial respiration. Shows the technique applied to an adult and a child, pointing out the operator’s position, placement of hands, action and timing.
